Edo Edo Teishoku!

Play Now!
My role:

Gameplay Designer

September 2023 - March 2024 (7 Months)

  • Designed on a team to create a card-based roguelike game set in a world full of cooking themed monsters.
  • Developed and iterated through the gameplay mechanics and abilities of one of the main bosses.
  • Created a detailed skill tree with varying abilities/passives for a playable character class.
